abstract: Laurent Tapie said the acquisition of Full Tilt Poker, the troubled gambling site, would involve the full repayment of all players, who are owed about $300 million.
snippet: Laurent Tapie said the acquisition of Full Tilt Poker, the troubled gambling site, would involve the full repayment of all players, who are owed about $300 million.

headline.main: Full Tilt Poker's Acquirer Shows His Cards
